overview.en: By Fully leveraging the technology of distributed ledger (DLT) and digital encryption, O2 separates the single payment action into 2 different steps: pay and unlock, and so it will be able to overcome the innate weakness of the current banknote due to its limitation from its physical natures.
overview.zh: O2充分利用區塊鏈技術的分散式記帳，去中心化和加密數位貨幣技術，改造傳統紙幣本身因為其物理特性而與生俱來的弊端，就是我們天天要面對的，甚至已經習以為常的欺詐風險。
